footer.subscribe_desc: Subscribe to receive news about our upcoming events
footer.short_desc: We are a fundamental church dedicated to the family. Our purpose is to be a Biblical, Christ-centered, and missionary church serving the Hispanic population.

radio.title: God Wants to Talk to You
radio.description: We invite you to discover our Christian radio station, The Voice, a ministry of the Berea Fundamental Baptist Church dedicated to faithfully proclaiming the gospel of Jesus Christ through preaching sound doctrine and music that exalts the Lord.
